title: Ep. 737 The Media Continues to Ignore this Exploding Scandal
description:
Summary:
In this episode I address Paul Ryan’s troubling comments about Spygate along with his trepidation on the explosive Awan scandal. I also address the media’s losing efforts to derail the Trump presidency. 
 
News Picks:
This is an older piece, but it provides a timeline that proves the discussion about Hillary’s emails started long before George Papadopoulos.
 
The anti-Trump FBI agent had a larger role in the investigation than previously reported. 
 
What ever happened to the Samantha Power unmasking scandal?
 
Explosive information about the House IT scandal involving the Awan brothers.
 
Tax cuts are wonderful, but we need to do more.
 
Mick Mulvaney fires the entire CFPB advisory board. 
 
Copyright CRTV. All rights reserved.

content:encoded:
Summary: In this episode I address Paul Ryan’s troubling comments about Spygate along with his trepidation on the explosive Awan scandal. I also address the media’s losing efforts to derail the Trump presidency.    News Picks: This is an older piece, but it provides a timeline that proves the discussion about Hillary’s emails started long before George Papadopoulos.   The anti-Trump FBI agent had a larger role in the investigation than previously reported.    What ever happened to the Samantha Power unmasking scandal?   Explosive information about the House IT scandal involving the Awan brothers.   Tax cuts are wonderful, but we need to do more.   Mick Mulvaney fires the entire CFPB advisory board.    Copyright CRTV. All rights reserved.
